storyInfo: Silence is hired by Rhine Lab as she wishes. Despite her shy nature, she is able to make a new friend.

attributes.content: Thank you so much, Silence! I wouldn't have been able to get into Rhine Lab to observe, if not for you.
attributes.name: Cheery Woman

attributes.content: No need to thank me. Just doing my job.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It was worth it, waking you up every morning during exam weeks!
attributes.name: Cheery Woman

attributes.content: I got myself up too.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Twice, in all those years!
attributes.name: Cheery Woman

attributes.content: Hehe...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: There are some real lookers at that company. Tell me the truthâ€”anybody caught your eye?
attributes.name: Cheery Woman

attributes.content: Huh? Er, no... I've only been here a few days...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Alright, I'll stop teasing you.
attributes.name: Cheery Woman

attributes.content: I know how obsessed you are with science. You'll never take the initiative to ask anybody out.
attributes.name: Cheery Woman

attributes.content: To be honest, though, we're a little concerned.
attributes.name: Cheery Woman

attributes.content: About what?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Your shyness is your only flaw. Setting aside romance for a moment, we're worried that you won't be able to find a friend to talk to at work.
attributes.name: Cheery Woman

attributes.content: Y-You don't need to worry.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: All my colleagues are very nice. Nothing to worry about, at all.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: ...I guess so.
attributes.name: Cheery Woman

attributes.content: I'm in Trimounts for three days, which means I'll be around for the weekend.
attributes.name: Cheery Woman

attributes.content: Let's play all over Trimounts tomorrow!
attributes.name: Cheery Woman

attributes.content: Good morning, Silence.
attributes.name: Researcher A

attributes.content: Good morning, Mr. Miller.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Happy Monday, Chris!
attributes.name: Researcher B

attributes.content: Happy Monday, Susanna.
attributes.name: Researcher A

attributes.content: Go anywhere over the weekend?
attributes.name: Researcher B

attributes.content: Nope. Stayed home and binged a whole season of Blood and Dividends.
attributes.name: Researcher A

attributes.content: Oh, same here. Stayed up all night to finish it!
attributes.name: Researcher B

attributes.content: You like that show, Silence?
attributes.name: Researcher A

attributes.content: I... I haven'tâ€”
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Let's change the subject... what did you do over the weekend, Silence? Did you go out?
attributes.name: Researcher B

attributes.content: Yes! An old classmate came to Trimounts, and we went to a bunch of places.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I liked to go out on weekends when I first got here too. There are some choice places in town, which is your favorite?
attributes.name: Researcher B

attributes.content: Trimounts Common.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The Common? But it's just a bunch of trees. Why would youâ€”
attributes.name: Researcher A

attributes.content: Chris.
attributes.name: Researcher B

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Researcher A

attributes.content: Well, we've got a thing, better get going. Happy Monday!
attributes.name: Researcher B

attributes.content: That's all for this week's agenda. Dismissed.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Silence, a moment of your time.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Of course, Doctor.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: How are things going on the job?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I like the atmosphere here at the company. Everyone is very passionate.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: As you are yourself. Your talent stands out, even in this place. I have high hopes for you.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Thank you...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But you have a tendency to be aloof, outside of work.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: There are a lot of young people here. We need to maintain a collegial atmosphere, whether it's having a chat or going out together, some social interaction can be conducive to our work.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Of course you do. Everybody does.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: But the trick is to actually do it.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Anyway, I'm not here to lecture you. I have a task for you.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I'm not going to force you into a project or a team. Take a look around and see if there's a place in the Structural Section that interests you.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I'll take your preferences and our needs into account.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Team Sherman... focusing on Originium particle pathology. They're currently working on...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I guess Team 7 fits my preferences better.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But that team is full of veteran researchers... I don't know if it's appropriate to ask to join them...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Hey, you over there! Did you see a Liberi woman who looks half-asleep come through here?
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: Liberi woman... half-asleep?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Not you, of course. She has white hair, and she's wearingâ€”
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: Ack, never mind. Doesn't look like she came this way.
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: Don't think she's here, Karen. Let's look somewhere else.
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: Where could she have gone? Why can't she just stay put in her room?
attributes.name: Researcher D

attributes.content: (Are they looking for somebody?)
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: (Liberi woman who looks half-asleep... they might have mistaken me for her, if she didn't have white hair.)
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Only one team left. Let's see... Device #9.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Their office should be here.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: There's a thick coat of dust on the doâ€”
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Liberi woman... white hair... half-asleep...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Are you the patient they're looking for?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Or did you just happen to be unlucky enough to resemble the one they're looking for?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Or are you a member of this team?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Team Member

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm Olivia Silence. I just joined Rhine Lab recently. Nice to meet you. What's your name?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence takes a look at the dusty bulletin board. There is only one name on itâ€”Joyce Moore.
Are you Joyce Moore?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Affirmative.
attributes.name: Joyce Moore

attributes.content: Affirmative?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Found herâ€”
attributes.name: Researcher D

attributes.content: You were just over there! Were you lying? Were you trying to help her avoid us?
attributes.name: Researcher D

attributes.content: No, I didn'tâ€”
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Enough.
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: This is Rhine Lab, not your college dorm! Did you think it was funny, helping her play hide-and-seek?
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: I'm not...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Enough. I don't know what you were thinking, but you're interfering with our work.
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: I'll report this!
attributes.name: Researcher D

attributes.content: Thanks for the explanation. I'll clear this up.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Did something happen to Ms. Moore's team? Why is her name the only one there?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The team was disbanded after a failed experiment. That office has been empty ever since.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: The names of the others have been removed from the board, but Moore remains hospitalized, so her name has yet to be removed.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: When will she be able to return to work?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Hard to say.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: The equipment used in the failed experiment remains in her brain. No one knows for sure what will become of her.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: What? How could that be?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It's a sad story.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Moore was an outstanding researcher who volunteered to be our test subject. You've seen what the failure of the experiment did to her.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Some measure of sacrifice is inevitable in science, but perhaps we paid too high a price.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Never mind that for now.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I heard you went around to all the teams. Have you decided where you want to go?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I want to...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I want to use my time to help Ms. Moore.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You want to take over her treatment?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I thought you were interested in the research that Team 7 is conducting.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I was... but I saw how the two researchers responsible for taking care of Ms. Moore treated her.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If she paid an inevitable price for science, I don't think she should be treated like that.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I want to help her.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm sure, if the same thing happened to me, you would do what you could to help me, wouldn't you?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: But it's a good idea to be prepared. Working at Rhine Lab has its risks.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Take yesterday, for example. I lost a bet and almost had to go on a vegan diet for a week. If that's not fatal, I don't know what is.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: ...Hehe.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You made your choice. Now you should make your preparations.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Hopefully, you'll learn a thing or two in the process.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: They let some fresh grad take my job?!
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: I thought you couldn't wait to hand it over? Now you got your wish.
attributes.name: Researcher D

attributes.content: (Whisper) How much time are you planning to waste on a woman who got her brain fried in an experiment?
attributes.name: Researcher D

attributes.content: Well, then, Ms. Moore is your responsibility now, Silence.
attributes.name: Researcher D

attributes.content: Wait, you haven't told me what's going on with her yet...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Read her medical record yourself.
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: Huh? Ms. Moore? Why are you standing?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Let's see here...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: 'Joyce Moore exhibits cognitive and linguistic impairments. She has difficulty communicating. Frequently talks to herself, but what she says is unintelligible...'
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're still weak, Ms. Moore. You should go back to bed.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Is she mute?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Negative.
attributes.name: Joyce Moore

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: (Come to think of it, I think she said the word 'affirmative' when we first met.)
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: (But it's impossible to tell what she's trying to convey with that word alone.)
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're Liberi, right?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Affirmative.
attributes.name: Joyce Moore

attributes.content: When you say 'affirmative', do you mean 'yes'?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Affirmative.
attributes.name: Joyce Moore

attributes.content: Warning: Potential misunderstanding.
attributes.name: Joyce Moore

attributes.content: Dialogue is logically valid even if 'affirmative' denotes negation of statement.
attributes.name: Joyce Moore

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Er... let me think...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're right!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If 'affirmative' means 'no', you would still have answered 'affirmative' when asked whether 'affirmative' meant 'yes'.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You figured that out so quickly? Doesn't sound like cognitive impairment to me.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Anyway, it's getting late. I'll fetch you lunch from the cafeteria.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: (She's gone silent again.)
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Warning... system... unknown error...
attributes.name: Joyce Moore

attributes.content: Ms. Moore? Ms. Joyce Moore?!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Her breathing is steady, as are her vital signs... did she just fall asleep suddenly?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: There are some similarities with my own symptoms.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: How are you feeling today, Joyce?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Increase in flexibility detected. High intensity rehabilitation exercises possible.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Great.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But you just exercised yesterday, and it's the weekend. You should take a day off.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Dr. Silence's instructions have proven effective, indicating considerable medical expertise.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: No, I only just graduated.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Correction. Dr. Silence is a recent graduate with considerable medical expertise.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: (Blushes)
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: By the way, if you're not doing rehab today, I want to...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: (Tilts head)
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: I want to watch a show in your room.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Today not a work day. It is recommended that Dr. Silence view the show at home with friends.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Well, I don't have any frienâ€”
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Dr. Silence is welcome to watch here, if the recommended scenario cannot be achieved.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Affirmative.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: What is the name of the series?
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Blood and Dividends.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Popcorn is recommended.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Is there popcorn in the office?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Leave this room, turn left. Proceed one hundred and fifty meters, then turn right and proceed two hundred and seventy meters to find a popcorn vending machine on the corner. Note that caramel-flavored popcorn is suboptimal for this series.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Oh, we're out of popcorn.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: (Yawns)
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Let's take a break, Joyce.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: (Steady breathing)
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Is she asleep?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: ...Affirmative.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: It's fine. I have an Oripathy-related sleep disorder myself, so I understand.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Dr. Silence demonstrated below-average attention during playback.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Oh, you noticed.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm not a huge fan of finance-themed dramas, but my colleagues are all talking about it, so I felt like I had to watch it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Inquiry: why do you feel the need to watch the same drama?
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: To fit in, I guess. Otherwise, we just don't have anything to talk about.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm from a backwater with very little entertainment. When I went to college, my classmates helped me a lot, and I never had to try to fit in with the crowd.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But now...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: *sigh*.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Why do you find it necessary to conform to the collective?
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Dr. Silence does not appear particularly eager to build social relationships.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: I... I just felt that I should establish a good relationship with my colleagues, so I could be happier at work...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Balance must be achieved between insufficient conformity, and excessive conformity.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: You're... right.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Maybe I should return thisâ€”
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What are you doing? You watched a show with her?
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Don't mind me, just came to get something I left.
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: Kids these days have the weirdest ideas, using a soap opera to teach her how to talk like a normal person...
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: That's not it!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And Joyce doesn't suffer from any cognitive impairment. Your reports are wrongâ€”
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And...?
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: What do you mean by 'and'?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: So she has normal cognitive ability. So what? What are you gonna do about it?
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: What in theâ€”how could you falsify medical records like that, reporting symptoms that don't exist?!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Enough, little girl. Spare me your worthless sympathy. I know her much better than you do.
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: Why do you think she's been living in the wards? It's not because of her condition. It's Device #9!
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: What's the difference? Isn't Device #9 the cause of her condition?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Whatever... it's not like you'll listen.
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: But you'd better realize that you're the one causing trouble here. Do you know how much data your sympathy has cost us?
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: Data? What data are you talking about?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You really don't know? It's so obvious thatâ€”
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: Please be quiet.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: Please be quiet.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Please be quiet, Mr. Hancock.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Oh, I get it now. How kind of you to try to shield this naive little girl fromâ€”
attributes.name: Researcher C
Joyce
attributes.content: Please. Be. Quiet.
Joyce's expression has hardly changed, but Silence can feel her anger from the way she is pausing between words.
...Hmph.
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: Suit yourself.
attributes.name: Researcher C

attributes.content: What was he trying to say? What data?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Noise.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Noise?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Harmful noise.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: ...I still don't understand.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You will, with time.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Now playing Blood and Dividends, episode 7.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: That's all for this week's agenda.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Before you go, a word with you, Silence.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Of course, Dr. Parvis.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: (Whisper) She screwed up, didn't she?
attributes.name: Researcher D

attributes.content: Silence, we need to talk about your work arrangement.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I told you to prepare to hand over the care of Joyce Moore. How are things going on that front?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I've rectified her medical record and included a list of terms in the appendices.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: List of terms?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: As I previously reported, Joyce's linguistic capabilities are functioning perfectly well. Her condition doesn't manifest in such skin-deep ways.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: (Whisper) Like hell.
attributes.name: Researcher D

attributes.content: Her unique speech pattern is a defense mechanism for mitigating the impact of Oripathy and the experiment. There is ample radiological and pathological evidence to support this assertion.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I have compiled a list of terms used by Joyce and their natural language equivalents, in order to make things easier for my successor.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Good work.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: However, I would prefer not to hand Joyce over to someone else.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: From a treatment perspective alone, I have no objection to the change.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: However, it takes time to change assignments, and energy to establish effective communication with Joyce. I am concerned that my successor may neglect Joyce's emotional needs. Such as...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Such as?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: ...Never mind.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: (Shrugs)
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I've heard Moore's thoughts on the matter.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: She communicated more or less the same, in her own way, requesting that you continue to be responsible for her treatment.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: (Whisper) Birds of a feather.
attributes.name: Researcher D

attributes.content: Objectively, Moore's recovery has progressed rapidly since you took over her treatment.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: A colleague will soon return to our service, thanks to you, Silence.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I appreciate the kind words.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: However, we still have a small problem.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Team 7 has been shorthanded lately, and I would very much like to reassign you there.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: If you're not willing to give up Moore, you'll have to balance both jobs at the same time.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Her? Team 7? Two jobs at the same time?!
attributes.name: Researcher D

attributes.content: What was that, Karen?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Er, no, nothing...
attributes.name: Researcher D

attributes.content: But then I gave it some thought. Now that Moore's condition has stabilized, you should be able to devote most of your efforts to Team 7.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I've already talked to the team lead, and we're just waiting to hear your thoughts.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You'll have a heavy workload, balancing both Moore's treatment and the research of Team 7. Are you up to it?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Yes! It would be an honor to work on Team 7!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We'll be counting on you on both sides, then.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Thank you!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Dismissed.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Wow, Olivia! That's amazing!
attributes.name: Researcher A

attributes.content: Don't pat her so hard, Chris.
attributes.name: Researcher B

attributes.content: Hehe, my bad.
attributes.name: Researcher A

attributes.content: OliviaLet's hit the bar tonight, Olivia. Your drinks are on me.
attributes.name: Researcher A

attributes.content: Thank you, Mr. Millerâ€”no, Chris, Susanna.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: No need to thank us. We want to hang out with you too. We can talk about anything!
attributes.name: Researcher A

attributes.content: Like... Blood and Dividends?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Of course!
attributes.name: Researcher A

attributes.content: I'm not so used to crowded places. Is that okay?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Of course. This is Trimounts, after all!
attributes.name: Researcher B

attributes.content: Who cares if you're a bit quiet in the bars, as long as you shine brightly in the labs!
attributes.name: Researcher B

attributes.content: As for this guy here, I'll throttle him if he asks any awkward questions.
attributes.name: Researcher B

attributes.content: I just can't get used to bars. Plus, I'm not much of a drinker.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Oripathy patients are advised to refrain from consuming alcohol.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: I thought I asked for something non-alcoholic, but then I realized I had an alcoholic drink, and a pretty stiff one at that.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But I couldn't really refuse under the circumstances, so I took a few sips.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The next time we go out together, I'm insisting that we go see the fountain in Trimounts Common.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Do you like the fountain in Trimounts Common?
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Yes, it reminds me of a little park back home. There was an identical fountain there, just a little smaller.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The fountain of Trimounts Common is known for its exotic design. It is possible that both fountains were built by Trimounts' Munson Inc.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Ha. I thought it was a fun coincidence, but I guess it's just Munson Inc. expanding its business into rural areas.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Dr. Silence appears to be experiencing nostalgia.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: The first few days here were tough, but I feel much better now that I have you to talk to.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Please continue to describe your hometown.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Let me think...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It's hard to know what to say, when you ask like that.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I understand what you mean, but it's hard to find the words to describe it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Suggestion: Departing now for Trimounts Common will be of assistance in describing your hometown.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Do you mean... you want to come with me to Trimounts Common?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Affirmative.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: So if I say yes... this will be the first time you've left Rhine Lab HQ since the accident.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: As far as I can tell, you're fully recovered, but Dr. Parvis recommended another week of rest for you, just in case.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: There is no need to worry.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Reason: Dr. Silence is a friend.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: The risk to health is extremely low, negligible when compared to a friend.
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Thank you, Joyce!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But let's wait until next week.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: (Tilts head)
attributes.name: Joyce

attributes.content: Me being your friend is all the more reason not to ask you to take risks.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Let's go to Trimounts Common once you're fully recovered.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I think this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship.
attributes.name: Silence
